name: SubwordConfig
description: Configurate what should be shown about words

subwordSize.description: Optionally, make the subwords smaller for a better overview

translations.description: show subwords for one or multiple languages

blurMode.description: Blur the word unless it's special for one reason or another. Might be useful for skimming (or maybe more)

audioMode.description: Audio for `WordMatrix` word can be played

replaceWordMode.description:
if "translate" is selected, first language from `translations` will be used

`alternative` picks the alternative writing using the `WordMatrix` if available

`phonetic` picks the phonetic writing using the `WordMatrix` if available

heatmapMode.description: colour words with heat having different meanings

typeDefinition.description: Configurate what should be shown about words

simplifiedSchema.fullComment: Configurate what should be shown about words

schema.fullComment: Optionally, make the subwords smaller for a better overview
show subwords for one or multiple languages
Blur the word unless it's special for one reason or another. Might be useful for skimming (or maybe more)
Audio for `WordMatrix` word can be played

if "translate" is selected, first language from `translations` will be used

`alternative` picks the alternative writing using the `WordMatrix` if available

`phonetic` picks the phonetic writing using the `WordMatrix` if available
colour words with heat having different meanings
